name: Galleria.io
description: Galleria has been serving top-quality image galleries to millions of web sites during the last years. We couldnu2019t be happier with all the positive response we received. But we realized that for some people the implementation can be too advanced or techy. Thatu2019s why we created Galleria Display, a simple interface for managing and publishing Galleria galleries to any web site
